author: DistroTube
description:
'inxi' is a full-featured system information tool.  This command line app prints info about all of your hardware and device drivers.  It comes with a ton of flags and options, depending on what specific information you're looking for.  

REFERENCED:
► https://smxi.org/docs/inxi.htm
